description: The Ultra Flex 2 Mid merges hiking boot protection and reliability in mixed mountain terrain with the agility of a trail running shoe. It’s built around its POMOCA® performance sole package, developed exclusively with Salewa®. Engineered for motion guidance, natural roll-off performance and efficient, energy-saving transition along the foot from heel-strike to toe-off. Its compound rubber and aggressive lug design provide surefooted grip and traction on both dry and wet surfaces in varying terrain and weather conditions.
name: Salewa Ultra Flex 2 Mid GTX - Mens
